Introduction
This topic contains information to assist Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS) end users with maintaining an eFolder in VBMS, including
VBMS new mail indicator
converting documents to portable document format (PDF) and uploading to the eFolder
associating an eFolder note
indexing a document in VBMS
using the documentâ€™s subject as a note
manually removing the banner that indicates documents are pending scanning
redacting eFolder documents containing criminal investigation reports
, and
other VBMS functionality available to maintain the eFolder
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Folder Maintenance
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
